action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Informatics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Dancing
AVAILABILITY: From July 15

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: From when are you available? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ANSWER: July 15th onwards. I can start as soon as possible and am eager to begin contributing to your team's success.
July 15th onwards. I can start as soon as possible and am eager to begin contributing to your team's success.
July 15th onwards. I can start as soon as possible and am eager to begin contributing to your team's success.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.

Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
What is your highest academic degree?
RECRUITER: What is your highest academic degree? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Master's Degree in Informatics, with a strong focus on <insert specific field of study if applicable>. My education has provided me with an excellent foundation for this role and I am eager to apply my knowledge and skills in a professional setting.

Master's Degree in Informatics, with a strong focus on <insert specific field of study if applicable>. My education has provided me with an excellent foundation for this role and I am eager to apply my knowledge and skills in a professional setting.
Value for BACHELOR anticipated; ground truth turn updated from 3 to 1.

Master's Degree in Informatics, with a strong focus on <insert specific field of study if applicable>. My education has provided me with an excellent foundation for this role and I am eager to apply my knowledge and skills in a professional setting.

Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: Do you have additional skills? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Yes, I have experience in dancing and believe it showcases my creativity, discipline, and ability to work well within teams or individually. Additionally, I possess strong communication skills which are vital for effective collaboration and successful project outcomes.

Yes, I have experience in dancing and believe it showcases my creativity, discipline, and ability to work well within teams or individually. Additionally, I possess strong communication skills which are vital for effective collaboration and successful project outcomes.

ANSWER: My Bachelor's degree is also in Informatics, providing me with a solid foundation in <insert specific skills/knowledge gained during Bachelor's>. This, coupled with my Master’s Degree, has equipped me with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in this role. I am confident that my educational background will enable me to quickly learn and adapt to any new tasks or challenges presented at your company.

For how long have you been working in the industry?
RECRUITER: For how long have you been working in the industry? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Three years, during which time I gained valuable experience in <insert specific industry-related skills/knowledge>. This has allowed me to develop a strong understanding of the field and build relevant competencies that will be beneficial for this position. 

ASIDE: Please provide details on your specific industry experience so I can tailor my responses accordingly
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.
